class.name: MIDI
class.brief_description: A resource that holds Standard MIDI File data.
class.description: [MIDI] wraps a Standard MIDI File (.mid, .midi), storing the parsed sequence of MIDI messages. It is used by [AudioStreamMIDI] as the source of musical events for playback. MIDI files are automatically loaded by the engine's resource loader when placed in the project. They can also be loaded from raw byte data at runtime using [method load_from_buffer].

method.name: load_from_buffer
method.description: Creates a new [MIDI] resource from a [PackedByteArray] containing raw MIDI file data. Returns [code]null[/code] on failure.
